_sText:
So i had the time to make a final version of this map, added/optimized much new stuff also HDR settings. you start with knife + awp full amo, map is optimized for normal and also noscope(+bhop) gameplay, i tried to balance the map as good as i can and also add some ways to get advantage to enemy,
enjoy playing and hf!

_____________________________________________________________________________
for installation just copy the files included in the download in your
Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\"cstrike" folder

the .bsp goes in "maps" folder and 
for the minimap add the two files .vmt .vtf in "materials/overviews" folder
and that one .txt file in "recource/overviews" folder should be easily understood, hf gl!
